title: TypeCon2008 Speakers listed
content:
From Typecon HQ  
-----------------------------------------------------------------  
SPEAKER SCHEDULE NOW POSTED  
----------------------------------------------------------------  
Find out when your favorite typographic guru is speaking. We've posted the speaker schedule on the TypeCon website. Full details of each session will be posted this week.

TypeCon2008 website - [http://www.typecon.com/calendar.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153500/http:/www.typecon.com/calendar.php)
author: kegler

comments.content: I'm only seeing 21 of the "70 legends and innovators" listed here... [http://www.typecon.com/speakers.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153500/http:/www.typecon.com/speakers.php "http://www.typecon.com/speakers.php") - known issue?
